text: apply unique filter in the response
unique filter how can you please help me about this

It sounds like you're doing it correct you're just not looking at the dynamic pages path you are looking at the listing page. Append the hs_path from the hubDB to your listing pages url and you should see your row page

Anything related to:
 - HubSpot Local development
 - Managing assets across multiple portals
 - Multi-language
 - Using Sass/Less and getting it into HubSpot
 - Where to properly add CSS/JS
We're always looking for contributors to CMS Dev blog and Code Gallery... if you're looking to get your name out there and get some link backs. :slightly_smiling_face:

You could test it... sometimes SMART content is pretty darn fast to save/update. :slightly_smiling_face:

Also - You can use SMART content via referral source... so even if the contact hasn't been saved - it could be set to display something different for any direct visitors.

Otherwise, you could fall back on just emailing the asset.
Either using a smart CTA (linked to PDF) or a smart rich text.
